headline: rainfall warning in effect
description:
Rain, at times heavy, continues.

What:
Local rainfall amounts up to 70 mm

When:
Ending this evening.

Additional information:
Heavy rain with embedded thunderstorms will continue into this evening.

###

Heavy downpours can cause flash floods and water pooling on roads.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
instruction: Watch for possible washouts near rivers, creeks and culverts.

affected_areas.area_description: Ear Falls - Perrault Falls - Western Lac Seul
